name: SCL Frequency Drift
description: SCL line toggling at 105 kHz (target 100 kHz).

name: Bus Noise Level
description: Bus noise level measured at 10 mV (within spec).

name: NACK Spike
description: Detected 5 NACKs in the last 1 000 transfers.

name: Clock Stretch Exceeded
description: Clock stretching observed for 1.2 ms (>1 ms threshold).

name: Bus Busy Hang
description: I²C bus stuck busy—no STOP condition detected.

name: Weak Pull-up Detection
description: Pull-up resistor strength below 2 kΩ threshold.

name: SDA Rise Time
description: SDA line rise time measured at 300 ns (within spec).

name: EMI Baseline
description: Baseline EMI noise measured at 5 mV.

name: Bus Voltage Stable
description: Bus voltage steady at 3.3 V with <1% variation.

name: Unexpected START Condition
description: Detected 2 unexpected START conditions in last 500 transfers.

name: SCL Frequency Deviation
description: SCL line toggling at 95 kHz (target 100 kHz).

name: Clock Stretch Near Threshold
description: Clock stretching observed for 0.9 ms (>0.8 ms warning threshold).

name: NACK Flood
description: 50 NACKs detected in 1,000 transfers.

name: Bus Arbitration Lost
description: Master lost arbitration, bus stuck busy.

name: Weak Pull-up Strength
description: I³C pull-up resistor network strength below 1.5 kΩ threshold.

name: Bus Idle Time
description: Average bus idle time measured at 20 µs (within expected range).

name: In-Band Interrupt Rate
description: Detected 2 in-band interrupts per 1 000 transfers (normal).

name: CCC Command Reception
description: Common Command Code 0x06 received successfully.

name: Clock Stretch Exceeded
description: Observed clock stretching of 0.9 ms (>0.8 ms warning threshold).

name: Dynamic Addr Assign Delay
description: Dynamic address assignment took 15 ms (>10 ms warning threshold).

name: EMI Noise Spike
description: Bus EMI noise spiked to 25 mV (>20 mV warning threshold).

name: Frequent NACKs
description: 20 NACKs detected in last 1 000 transfers.

name: Bus Collision Detected
description: Simultaneous master arbitration resulted in bus collision—bus locked.
